profile_classification.rationale: The job title 'Software Engineer - ML Threat Detection' and the focus on 'threat detection' strongly suggest a predictive modeling approach. While the description is brief, the core task of threat detection typically involves building and deploying models to identify anomalies or malicious patterns, aligning with the definition and core responsibilities of an ML Engineer, particularly in data-driven algorithm development and productionizing models for specific tasks.

job_tasks.justification: Threat detection inherently involves building and deploying models to identify patterns or anomalies.
The title 'Software Engineer' implies building and maintaining software systems, which would include the application of ML models.
